title: UQ Alumni
description: For UQ graduates who have a UQ username and password.
conditions: Graduate membership costs $75 per year or $50 for 6 months. Please allow 5 working days for your application to be processed. Please note that new graduates are eligible for one year free membership upon submission of the application form for new graduates.
agreement: And I have read the list of services available to UQ Alumni and I am aware of my entitlements

title: at LCCH, Mater or RBWH
description: For employees of LCCH, Mater or RBWH. Please allow 2 working days for your application to be processed.
upload: Please upload an image of your hospital ID that clearly shows your name and payroll number. If you are unable to upload the document it will need to be presented in person at your hospital library.
conditions: For employees of LCCH, Mater or RBWH. Please allow 2 working days for your application to be processed.

title: Retired UQ Staff
description: For retired UQ staff with at least 10 years of service at UQ.
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for community members and I am aware that membership does not include remote access to electronic resources.

title: Reciprocal Borrower
description: Free membership for eligible staff and students from a University that is a member of the University Libraries Australia and New Zealand agreement.
conditions: Free membership for eligible staff and students from a University that is a member of the University Libraries Australia and New Zealand agreement.
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for community members and I am aware that membership does not include remote access to electronic resources.
upload: Please upload proof of eligibility e.g. confirmation of enrolment / employment. Students from overseas will also need to supply a letter of introduction and indemnity from their home institution.

title: Proxy Borrower
description: For senior UQ / teaching hospital staff to nominate another staff member to borrow material on their behalf. This form is to be completed by the authorising borrower.
conditions: For senior UQ / teaching hospital staff to nominate another staff member to borrow material on their behalf. This form is to be completed by the authorising borrower. A Library card with your name and the name of the person authorised to borrow for you will be sent to you. The signature panel on the card must be signed by the nominated borrower.
agreement: And I understand that I am responsible for the return of Library materials borrowed on my behalf under this authorisation and that I may be charged for the replacement of material not returned.

title: Alumni Friends
description: For members of the Alumni Friends of The University of Queensland Inc.
conditions: For members of the Alumni Friends of The University of Queensland Inc. Membership costs $20 per year.
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for community members and I am aware that membership does not include remote access to electronic resources.
upload: Please upload proof of Alumni Friends membership.

title: Community
description: For members of the general public. Membership costs $25 per year.
conditions: For members of the general public. Membership costs $25 per year.
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for community members and I am aware that membership does not include remote access to electronic resources.

title: Friend of the Library
description: The Friends of the Library is a group of students, alumni, staff and community members who enjoy reading and learning and who share enthusiasm for the UQ Library. Annual membership costs: Level One $25 (students $15); Level Two Premium $100
conditions: The Friends of the Library is a group of students, alumni, staff and community members who enjoy reading and learning and who share enthusiasm for the UQ Library. Annual membership costs: Level One $25 (students $15); Level Two Premium $100
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for community members and I am aware that membership does not include remote access to electronic resources.

title: UQ Associate
description: For staff employed by UQ controlled entities e.g. JKTech.
conditions: For staff employed by UQ controlled entities e.g. JKTech.

title: Cyberschool
conditions: This application will be processed on confirmation that the School agrees to indemnify the University of Queensland Library for any outstanding resources.
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for UQL Cyberschool members and am aware of my entitlements
_upload: Please upload the completed UQL Cyberschool Student Borrowing Authorisations form.

title: New Graduates
description: New graduates are eligible for one year free membership following graduation or completion of your program.
conditions: New graduates are eligible for one year free membership following graduation or completion of your program. Please allow 3 working days for your application to be processed.
agreement: And I have read the list of services available to UQ Alumni and I am aware of my entitlements

title: Staff Awaiting Aurion
description: A Letter of Introduction and Indemnity (to be completed and signed by the Head of School or equivalent) must be uploaded to support the application.
conditions: A Letter of Introduction and Indemnity (to be completed and signed by the Head of School or equivalent) must be uploaded to support the application.
agreement: And I have read the privacy statement
upload: Please upload a scan of a completed Letter of Introduction and Indemnity.

title: Official Visitors
description: Official Visitors, higher degree candidates and deferring postgraduates (not on the UQ HR or Student admin  system)
conditions: Official Visitors, higher degree candidates and deferring postgraduates (not on the UQ HR or Student admin  system)
agreement: I have reviewed borrowing privileges for community members and I am aware that membership does not include remote access to electronic resources.
upload: A Letter of introduction and indemnity is to be signed by the appropriate UQ Head of School/Centre and uploaded in support of your application.
